name: dream.
description:
dream. is an experimental mobile-based riddle game that lets you explore an interwoven soundscape using audio. Using your device as a gesture detector, explore the different soundscapes of the game through the phone's sensors. NOTE: This game is designed to be played with headphones.

---

This game was a part of RISING SEA 2020 - A collaboration between game creators in South East Asia where game ideas come from unorthodox mediums encouraging creative freedom and experimentation.
